alert.note: Alert for Oregon Lower Treasure Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 08 at 1:30PM PDT until April 09 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM MDT /7 PM PDT/ THIS EVENING TO 6 AM MDT /5 AM PDT/ SATURDAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph associated with passage of a strong cold front. * WHERE...Treasure Valley in Oregon and Idaho. * WHEN...From 8 PM MDT /7 PM PDT/ this evening to 6 AM MDT /5 AM PDT/ Saturday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow unsecured objects around. Tree limbs could be blown down and power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust may reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
